title: Bug 10022: Incorrect 'Build' Popup Action Enablement
description: The 'Build' popup action enablement is incorrect.
OB: The 'Build' popup action is always enabled, even when a build is already completed. This leads to unnecessary manual builds.
EB: The 'Build' popup action should only be enabled if a manual build is required. If the build is already done automatically, the 'Build' option should be disabled.
SR: Ensure that the 'Build' popup action is correctly enabled/disabled based on whether a manual build is needed, and update the UI accordingly. Review the logic that determines the enablement of the 'Build' action to prevent unnecessary builds.
